heroTag: I bring human simplicity into complex AI systems.
about:
Hey! I'm Bharath Vishal — welcome to my little corner of the internet.
This site blends my journey through AI product management, analytics, and design. I love exploring where logic meets creativity — turning data into insight and products into experiences that actually feel human.

Over the years, I’ve moved across roles in analytics, automation, and product management at Byju’s, Schneider Electric, and Abracon. Each role taught me something new about connecting business, users, and technology.

Here you’ll find my projects, blogs, and experiments that explore how AI can make products more intuitive, meaningful, and delightful.

experience.title: Product Analyst - Global Product Management
experience.description: Developed and executed product roadmaps for the passive components portfolio, driving a 15% increase in market share and $3M in annual revenue from five new products. Led cross-functional teams to reduce production costs by 10% while maintaining quality. Optimized product adoption by 25% through refined go-to-market strategies. Introduced new semiconductor products generating 30% revenue growth and reducing time-to-market by 20%. Delivered 25% ROI on all product lines through effective product lifecycle management.

experience.title: Senior Product Analyst - Global Marketing and E-Commerce (B2B SaaS)
experience.description: Spearheaded product launches, optimizing nomenclature, categorization, and tag management — reducing product errors by 20% and improving search functionality. Conducted market research to drive a 25% increase in EcoXtructure market share. Built Power BI dashboards improving sales conversion by 12%. Enhanced product data processes, cutting search time by 40%. Led TAM/SAM/SOM analysis identifying 15% profitability growth. Streamlined marketing collateral creation, cutting production time/costs by 25% and boosting customer satisfaction by 18%.

experience.title: Operations Analyst
experience.description: Managed data cleaning, transformation, and analysis using Excel, Salesforce, and LMS. Ensured data quality assurance, generated reports, and handled customer service operations for billing and collections.

blogs.title: How Steve Jobs's Personal Trauma Shaped the iPhone in Your Hand
blogs.subheading: Not all ideas come from apples falling from trees — some are born from personal battles.
blogs.content:
